description:
房源靠近Columbia University和Central Park, 非常适合情侣、商务旅行者等。公寓楼Avalon一室一厅,面积大且全楼独有两面的中央公园和上西区落地窗全景,楼层高且安静,室内配备全新厨具设备和洗衣烘干机以及双空调及抽湿净化设备,并有月岛式全尺寸收纳柜大吧台。五月底购入日本全球新家居及用品,免费附送健身中心及会所活动室入场pass。
The apartment is close to Columbia University and Central Park. It's very suitable for couples and business travelers. 
The 1B1B apartment is in Avalon, one of the luxury apartments in Upper West side of NYC.  Washer and dryer is indoor. The furniture were purchased brand new in May. Free access to gym.

The apartment is available from now till the end of December. Please ignore the 7 days in early December that were marked unavailable. They are still available. Please feel free to ask any questions.
公寓一直可以租到12月底,可能延长到1月。

I probably will ask my friend to give keys to you. She will also show you around the apartment.
我会让我朋友交给您钥匙,并且带您熟悉公寓楼。

哥大附近各种餐馆,各色学院,各类自然风光。
Quiet and safe neighborhood close to Columbia University, with all kinds of restaurants and a few grocery stores nearby. A farmers market is just 1 min walk from apartment on every Saturday.

There is Metro line A/B/C/1 5mins walk to the apartment.
可以乘坐地铁线A/B/C/1,地铁站走路5分钟。
name: Bright 1BR in Luxury Apt (close to Columbia U)
review: The host canceled this reservation 38 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
